title: Digital Twin Assisted Beamforming Design for Integrated Sensing and Communication Systems
summary: This paper proposes a digital twin-based beamforming design for integrated sensing and communication (ISAC) systems, utilizing electromagnetic 3D models and ray tracing to optimize joint sensing and communication beamforming.
key_points: Near-optimal target sensing SNR in both LoS and NLoS dominant areas
Ensures required SINR for communication user
Potential of leveraging digital twins for ISAC systems

title: Beyond Diagonal Intelligent Reflecting Surface Aided Integrated Sensing and Communication
summary: This paper proposes a new IRS architecture called BD-IRS for uplink integrated sensing and communication (ISAC) systems. It aims to estimate the location of an active target while minimizing mutual interference between sensing and communication.
